entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:07 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 10:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: SSE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to showers overnight. Snow over the Port au Port Peninsula early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 15 to 25 mm except 40 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near midnight then southwest 20 gusting to 40. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
